RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibi lity).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TYRY TYRANNOSAURUS raced in the middle of the pack to the second turn then steadily advanced to the final turn, made a rail bid entering the stretch to take the lead in the final sixteenth and held on. STRONG HEART stalked the pace from three or four wide to the backstretch then moved up to press the pace from the two path and fought gamely in the drive to be a game second. ROCKY DICE tracked the leaders to the top of the stretch then moved out to four wide for a late run but was not enough but was up for the show. GANDHI'S ORION was hustled along to prompt the pace then took the lead at the half pole and was headed at the three sixteenths pole but gave way grudgingly. CAIRO BOOGIE raced in the middle of the pack to the three eighths pole then launched a four wide bid but lacked the late response in the stretch. WICKOSITY was unhurried through the final turn and passed tiring rivals. FRONT PORCH saved ground to no avail. AMERICAN ROCKY was allowed to settle and remained back. SIENTE EL AMOR was away alertly to set a pressured pace to the half pole and slowly retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Front Porch
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Wickosity
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: American Rocky
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Siente El Amor
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressured pace, slow retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Rocky Dice
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4w stretch, late run, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed pace, game 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tyry Tyrannosaurus
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, steady advance, rail bid, late lead, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo Boogie
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 4w bid, lacked late response

ENTRY.NAME: Gandhi's Orion
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, prompted pace, took lead 1/2p, gave way grudgingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,0 00 1 lb. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAGER WORTHY was forwardly placed on the inside then dueled between horses in the stretch and won the nod. PHILMARY CASTLE was off the pace through the final turn then made a three wide bid into the stretch, dueled down the stretch but was outnodded. MAKINLIMMARGARITAS sprinted away from the gates to set a clear pace battled down the stretch but was denied. APPEALING ROAD stalked the pace from the two path then made a four wide bid on the final turn and finished evenly. DEREKA'S BLUFF raced near the back down the backstretch then made a three wide bid on the final turn but had no late kick. KEY TO THE CASTLE trailed the field and was never a threat. AWESOME MOON tracked the leaders to the final turn and weakened. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS LODGED, THE JOCKEY OF APPEALING ROAD CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF WAGER WORTHY FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AROUND THE THREE SIXTEENTH POLE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Key to the Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Wager Worthy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, stretch duel, won nod

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Makinlimmargaritas
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted away, set clear pace, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Dereka's Bluff
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 3w turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Philmary Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w upper, stretch duel, outnodded

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4w 2nd turn, evenly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 18500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALLEGHENY HERO was forwardly placed off the rail then made a bid on the turn from the two path then engaged the leader at the eighth pole and drew off. ONE CANDY CASTLE was off a step slow then rushed up the rail to be off the pace, drifted out, brushed with DRUNK TEST then checked slightly going into the turn, moved out to four wide in upper stretch and showed late effort to be up for the place. NEEDNOEXPLANATION had brief foot leaving the gate then prompted the pace, bumped with J. WICK GOING into the turn and lost action, made a rebid going three wide in upper stretch to re-engage the leader at the eighth pole and was a game third. J. WICK was hustled up the rail to take the lead then bumped with NEEDNOEXPLANATION going into the turn and kept on, then was headed at the eighth pole and tired. DRUNK TEXT was away alertly then tracked the leaders to the turn, was brushed by ONE CANDY CASTLE going into the turn, moved out to five wide in upper stretch but lacked a rally. BOO TOO broke in the air and was not a threat. SMALL PAW was off the pace in the three path then forced out to five wide on the turn, moved out to six wide in upper stretch but was empty. SWEET T had no speed and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: One Candy Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, rushed up, drift out, checked, late effort

ENTRY.NAME: Small Paw
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, forced out, 5w turn, 6w upper, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Allegheny Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, off rail, engaged leader, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Boo Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet T
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: J. Wick
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, bumped turn, headed 1/8p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Drunk Text
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, tracked leaders, brushed turn, 5w upper, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Neednoexplanation
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, prompted pace, bumped, lost action, rebid, game 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Starter Allowance Purse 20700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE MAY 26, 2021. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where E ntered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMPANY CLOWN was hustled early then chased the leader to mid stretch and split horses to make a late surge for the win. MR TINGLES sprinted to a clear lead but was caught in the final jumps. BLACK CANDY was off the pace in the three path then moved up on the turn and fought gamely. GRUMPELSTILTSKIN chased the field to the turn then moved up from two wide on the turn, moved out to three wide in upper stretch to improve position. LOADED SNIPER was close up early while saving ground but was not a factor. KUKULKAN tracked the leaders while racing widest of all.

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Sniper
ENTRY.OWNER: P and H Stables and C and B Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early, saved ground, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Company Clown
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, chased leader, split horses, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Grumpelstiltskin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3w upper, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Tingles
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to lead, caught final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Black Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, moved up turn, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Kukulkan
ENTRY.OWNER: Diamond Oak Stable and Splurgin Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4w trip

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 19600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Wher e Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: S S SPARTAN ENERGY stalked the pace down the backstretch then moved between horses at the three eighths pole to engage the leader at the top of the stretch and drew clear. RED HOT TODDY went to the front to set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch when headed by outside rival and proved to be second best. MONKEY WRENCH stalked the pace from the three path then moved out to four wide in upper stretch to be up for the show. HILLBILLY ROCK roused away from the gate to press the pace to the quarter pole and gave way. NICE BUT NAUGHTY raced near the back around the first turn then advanced up the backstretch and improved position. PINNACLE REEF was off the pace on the inside but never made a serious bid. FELICIAS CASTLE was off a step slow then was bumped by S S ALASKAN CRUZ going into the first turn, advanced from three wide on the backstretch and faltered. JACKSON MAN saved ground to no avail. S S ALASKAN CRUZ bumped FELICIAS CASTLE going into the first turn then had to steady and remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Jackson Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: S S Spartan Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, between horses 3/8, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Felicias Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, bumped, advanced 3w, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Toddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace, headed, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Hillbilly Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused away, pressed pace, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: dh-S S Alaskan Cruz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, steadied, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Pinnacle Reef
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Nice But Naughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, advanced, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Monkey Wrench
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4w upper, up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 19600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OX DOC shot away from the gate then dueled to mid turn and inched away to prove best. STORM TRAPPE vied for the lead then dueled around the turn but was no match for the winner and held second. THE ILLUSIONIST had no early speed then made a three wide late rally. PRIMETIME JET pressed the pace for the first furlong then fell back and was out finished in the late stretch. MIMS HAT TRICK chased the leaders to the turn then made a rail bid but was empty. NIGHT TRAIN WAYNE trailed to the top of the stretch and passed tiring foes. BIGZ'S CABANA BOY stumbled slightly at the start then was placed off the pace around the turn and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Trappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, dueled turn, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mims Hat Trick
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, rail bid turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Night Train Wayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, pass tired ones

ENTRY.NAME: Primetime Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, fell back, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Bigz's Cabana Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, off pace, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: The Illusionist
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, 3w late rally

ENTRY.NAME: Ox Doc
ENTRY.COMMENT: shot away, dueled turn, best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Calumet Farm & Dr. & Mrs. Charles Huber

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 30500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race Since April 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLADRIEL went to the lead to set all the pace and was kept to task in the stretch drive. FLAT DISCOUNT was off the pace down the backstretch then made a bid on the final turn but couldn't catch the winner. SOMEBODY LOVES ME was unhurried down the backstretch then made a late inside bid in the stretch to be up for the show. DROPKICK QUEEN tracked the leader from the three path then made a mild bid on the final turn but had no kick in the drive. GRACE'S SECRET raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground but was not a threat. MYGIDGETMARIE stumbled badly at the start, trailed the field to the first turn then moved up from three wide on the backstretch but had no rally. GOLDEN SWEETS pressed the pace from the two path to the three eighths pole and dropped back. MISS FUSSY PANTS stalked the pace to the five sixteenths pole and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Mygidgetmarie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly, 3w advance, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Gladriel
ENTRY.COMMENT: led throughout, set pace, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Dropkick Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, mild bid turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Fussy Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Somebody Loves Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, inside bid, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Discount
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, bid 2nd turn, couldn't catch

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 26, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

CLAIM.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK PANDA was off the pace around the turn then made a four wide bid in upper stretch, drifted in at the sixteenths pole but kept on and drew clear late. FORTES was off a step slow then rushed to contention and saved ground around the turn, split horses in final yards to be up for the place. INCLUDE THE BEAST was off the pace on the inside then moved out to three wide in upper stretch to make a run but had to alter path at the sixteenth pole but was able to save the show. LITTLE BIT OF THAT sprinted to the lead then shared command around the turn but was out finished in the drive. CAPTAIN SAM was hustled along to share the command around the turn and was out kicked in the drive. HOT CAROL chased the leaders but was not a threat. UNLOCK was forwardly placed in the early stages then made a three wide bid on the turn but had no late kick. SHENANDOAH CAT had no speed and was not a factor. RED PRIESTESS had no speed and was outrun. A TRAINER OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE TRAINER OF INCLUDE THE BEAST CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST BLACK PANDA FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH RUN, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Include the Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, 3w upper, alter path 1/16, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Fortes
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, contention, split horses, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Shenandoah Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Black Panda
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 4w upper, drifted in 1/16, kept on, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Unlock
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 3w turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bit of That
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to lead, shared command turn, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Red Priestess
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, shared command turn, out kicked
